issue.title: [Rust] [Ballista] Benchmark documentation out of date
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12313](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12313). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The scheduler/executor were refactored and the documentation for the benchmarks now needs updating. I plan on fixing this over the weekend.

comments.body:
